definition: to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
fast/rapid/quick/velocity
moderator/reducer (mechanical gearbox)

sentences.english: You may have heard terms like rear axle ratio or final drive ratio.
sentences.chinese: 你可能已经学过后桥减速比或主减速比。

sentences.english: You may have heard terms like rear axle ratio or final drive ratio.
sentences.chinese: 你可能已经学过后桥减速比或主减速比。

sentences.english: Take efficient speed deceleration mechanism by parallel shafts .
sentences.chinese: 采用平形轴式减速机构，效率高。

sentences.english: Compared with that of conventionalS-shape curve ACC/DEC algorithm, the system performance has been significantly improved.
sentences.chinese: 与传统的S形曲线加减速算法相比，提高了效率。

sentences.english: Slowing abilities and spells will no longer decrease the speed of a player when traveling by Gryphon.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐狮鹫时，减速魔法和效果不再会降低玩家的速度。

sentences.english: This result was the first direct evidence of the decelerating epoch.
sentences.chinese: 这就是减速时期的第一项直接证明。

sentences.english: NEMA standard gearheads mount directly to the unit.
sentences.chinese: NEMA标准减速机直接安装到指定单位。

sentences.english: He shifted into low gear. The two vehicles began to decelerate.
sentences.chinese: 他换上低速档，两辆车开始减速了。

sentences.english: These refer to the gear ratio in the differential.
sentences.chinese: 在差速器中，这些都是指减速比。

sentences.english: Is the mechanical movement in pieces of mechanical parts restless or slowed down.
sentences.chinese: 是使机械中的运动件休止或减速的机械零件。

sentences.english: Navigate with reduced speed when the fog set in. Report me immediately.
sentences.chinese: 下雾时，减速航行，并立即向我报告。

sentences.english: The motion accelerates and decelerates at the beginning and end of each clip.
sentences.chinese: 移动在开始和结尾的每个剪辑处加速和减速。

sentences.english: Her teeth are so yellow that traffic slows down when she smiles.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙太黄了当她笑着露出牙齿时，汽车见了就减速。

sentences.english: The slewing mechanism consists of hydraulic motor and worm speed reducer.
sentences.chinese: 回转机构由液压马达及蜗轮蜗杆减速器组成。

sentences.english: The foundry method design of a nodular iron reductor housing with ferrite matrix was de-scribed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了铁素体基体球铁减速器壳体的铸造工艺设计。

sentences.english: Variable decelerations representing cord compression are frequently seen in postdates pregnancies.
sentences.chinese: 过期妊娠常因脐带受压出现变异减速。

definition: to turn/to go around a corner
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
to step on the brake/to brake (when driving)
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
to overtake (another car)
emergency braking
vehicle speed
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
to retard/to decelerate
to brake
to change lanes
to make a sudden turn
to turn one's head/to turn round/to turn about
drifting (motorsport)
(of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
